section_title: Consequential amendments, savings, transitional provisions and repeals.
section_text: 4 1 The enactments specified in Schedule 3 to this Act shall have effect subject to the amendments there specified, being amendments consequential on the provisions of this Act. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 4 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

5 1 This Act may be cited as the Insurance Companies Act 1980. 2 This Act shall come into operation on such day as the Secretary of State may by order made by statutory instrument appoint. 3 This Act extends to Northern Ireland.
